name: rerebi

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(cre, c0), c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
stmt.pretty: ax-mp((c0 ∈ ℝ ↔(Re ` c0)= c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(cre, c0), c0))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cc), wb(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(cre, c0), c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(cre, c0), c0))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cc), wb(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(cre, c0), c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wb(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(cre, c0), c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(cre, c0), c0))
-| wcel(c0, cc)

comment: A real number equals its real part. Proposition 10-3.4(f) of [Gleason] p. 133. (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-1999.)
